languages.text: "О, какая страсть! Какая наивная самоуверенность! Когда все это обратится в безбрежное отчаяние и липкий ужас, меня и моих гостей ждет изысканное наслаждение. Я бы и сама поиграла с тобой, мон-кай, но тогда спектакль будет недолог — а мы не хотим расстроить моих гостей, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "О, какая страсть! Какая наивная самоуверенность! Когда все это обратится в безбрежное отчаяние и липкий ужас, меня и моих гостей ждет изысканное наслаждение. Я бы и сама поиграла с тобой, мон-кай, но тогда спектакль будет недолог — а мы не хотим расстроить моих гостей, верно?"

languages.text: "Oh, what passion! What naive arrogance! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, my guests and I will savour such exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, now do we?"
languages.original_text: "О, какая страсть! Какая наивная самоуверенность! Когда все это обратится в безбрежное отчаяние и липкий ужас, меня и моих гостей ждет изысканное наслаждение. Я бы и сама поиграла с тобой, мон-кай, но тогда спектакль будет недолог — а мы не хотим расстроить моих гостей, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, what passion! What naive overconfidence! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, me and my guests will savor an exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, do we?"

"Oh, what passion! What naive overconfidence! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, me and my guests will savor an exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, do we?"

"Oh, what passion! What naive overconfidence! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, my guests and I will savour such exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, now do we?"

"Oh, what passion! What naive arrogance! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, my guests and I will savour such exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, now do we?"

"Oh, what passion! What naive arrogance! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, my guests and I will savour such exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, now do we?"

languages.text: 「ほぉ、威勢が良いこと！世間知らずの怖いもの知らずときた！これが果てなき絶望と、どこまでも付いてくる恐怖に丸ごと変わるとき、観客と私は何とも言えない愉悦を感じるのさ。この私が遊んであげよう、モン＝ケイ。ただし、決着はすぐについてしまうが…観客を怒らせたくない、始めようか？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, what passion! What naive arrogance! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, my guests and I will savour such exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, now do we?"

traits.locale_text: 「ほぉ、威勢が良いこと！世間知らずの怖いもの知らずときた！これが果てなき絶望と、どこまでも付いてくる恐怖に丸ごと変わるとき、観客と私は何とも言えない愉悦を感じるのさ。この私が遊んであげよう、モン＝ケイ。ただし、決着はすぐについてしまうが…観客を怒らせたくない、始めようか？」

languages.text: “噢，你可真有精神！你天真的傲慢也真有趣！等这一切变成无尽的绝望与恐惧时，我和我的客人们将会品尝到无比的快乐。我很乐意亲自陪你玩玩，不过那样的话，这场演出恐怕很快就会结束了。我们可不想惹我的客人们不高兴，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, what passion! What naive arrogance! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, my guests and I will savour such exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, now do we?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，你可真有精神！你天真的傲慢也真有趣！等这一切变成无尽的绝望与恐惧时，我和我的客人们将会品尝到无比的快乐。我很乐意亲自陪你玩玩，不过那样的话，这场演出恐怕很快就会结束了。我们可不想惹我的客人们不高兴，没错吧？”

languages.text: « Oh, quelle passion ! Quelle arrogance teintée de naïveté ! Mes invités et moi aurons droit à un véritable festin quand tous ces beaux sentiments se transformeront en désespoir et en terreur absolue. Je jouerais bien avec vous, mon-keigh, mais la partie serait bien trop courte, et nous ne voudrions pas contrarier mes invités, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, what passion! What naive arrogance! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, my guests and I will savour such exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, now do we?"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, quelle passion ! Quelle arrogance teintée de naïveté ! Mes invités et moi aurons droit à un véritable festin quand tous ces beaux sentiments se transformeront en désespoir et en terreur absolue. Je jouerais bien avec vous, mon-keigh, mais la partie serait bien trop courte, et nous ne voudrions pas contrarier mes invités, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: «¡Oh, qué pasión! ¡Qué ingenua arrogancia! Cuando se convierta en desesperación sin límites y terror abyecto, mis visitantes y yo degustaremos un placer exquisito. Jugaría contigo personalmente, pero la actuación sería demasiado breve. No queremos ofender a mis huéspedes, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Oh, what passion! What naive arrogance! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, my guests and I will savour such exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, now do we?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, qué pasión! ¡Qué ingenua arrogancia! Cuando se convierta en desesperación sin límites y terror abyecto, mis visitantes y yo degustaremos un placer exquisito. Jugaría contigo personalmente, pero la actuación sería demasiado breve. No queremos ofender a mis huéspedes, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: "Oh, diese Leidenschaft! Diese naive Arroganz! Wenn sich all das in grenzenlose Verzweiflung und nacktes Entsetzen verwandelt, dann werden meine Gäste und ich dieses exquisite Vergnügen auskosten. Ich würde ja selbst mit Euch spielen, Chem-Pan-Sey, doch dann wäre die Darbietung sehr schnell vorbei. Und wir wollen doch meine Gäste nicht verärgern, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, what passion! What naive arrogance! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, my guests and I will savour such exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, now do we?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, diese Leidenschaft! Diese naive Arroganz! Wenn sich all das in grenzenlose Verzweiflung und nacktes Entsetzen verwandelt, dann werden meine Gäste und ich dieses exquisite Vergnügen auskosten. Ich würde ja selbst mit Euch spielen, Chem-Pan-Sey, doch dann wäre die Darbietung sehr schnell vorbei. Und wir wollen doch meine Gäste nicht verärgern, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: "Bu nasıl bir hırs, nasıl saf bir kibir böyle? Tüm bu yaşananların bitmek bilmez bir ümitsizliğe ve boğucu bir dehşete dönüştüğü o enfes anın tadını konuklarımla birlikte çıkaracağız. Mon-keigh, seninle bizzat ilgilenirdim ama o zaman gösteriyi kısa kesmem gerekirdi. Konuklarımızı üzmek istemeyiz, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, what passion! What naive arrogance! When all this turns into boundless despair and clinging terror, my guests and I will savour such exquisite pleasure. I would play with you myself, mon-keigh, but then the performance would be brief — and we don't want to upset my guests, now do we?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu nasıl bir hırs, nasıl saf bir kibir böyle? Tüm bu yaşananların bitmek bilmez bir ümitsizliğe ve boğucu bir dehşete dönüştüğü o enfes anın tadını konuklarımla birlikte çıkaracağız. Mon-keigh, seninle bizzat ilgilenirdim ama o zaman gösteriyi kısa kesmem gerekirdi. Konuklarımızı üzmek istemeyiz, değil mi?"
